entries.title: Naboo system: Protect Alliance Refugee Transport.
entries.thanks_3: Now THAT'S what an Alliance Pilot can do!
entries.taunt_3: Dump out those spies you're protecting... and we'll let you live!
entries.taunt_2: I've seen you before, Rebel scum! But this time will be the last...
entries.taunt_1: You are transporting Rebel terrorists! Lower your shields and prepare to be boarded!
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < There's another freighter that need your help pilot, don't let us down again! >
entries.shields_depleted: Whoah! Our shields are down, buddy! Keep the badguys off us, okay?
entries.reason_3: I think the Empire wants to ask us some questions... after they've spaced us!
entries.reason_2: Imperial interceptors have been tailing us since we picked up these passengers.
entries.reason_1: The Empire thinks our refugees are Rebel spies! Can you believe that?!
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Fly to the intercept point and wait for the Alliance refugee transport to arrive.
entries.quest_location_d: Locate an Alliance refugee transport that has been lost in the Naboo system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Protect the Alliance Refugee Transport as it makes its way out of the Naboo system. Destroy any hostiles that attack the transport. Keep a close watch on the Refugees...
entries.panic_2: Get these fighters off us, now!
entries.hull_half: Help! The ship is torn to pieces! People are dying in here!
entries.hello: Thank the maker! Please! You must help us get these refugees out of the system. The Empire has been on our tail since the last hyper-jump.
entries.goodbye_3: Excellent work, buddy! Everyone on-board is safe and sound. We'll let Alliance Command know how much you helped us.
entries.goodbye_2: The refugees thank you, my friend... as I'm sure do all of their relatives and of course the Alliance. The Force be with you!
entries.goodbye_1: We are very grateful for your gallant rescue, my friend! The Force be with you...
entries.goodbye: Thanks for taking care of us, friend! The Force be with you...
entries.found_loc: Fly to the Alliance Refugee Transport's last known location.
entries.failed_protect: Refugee transport has been lost! Mission is a failure.
entries.failed_destroy: All refugees have been lost. The mission is a failure. Return to base.
entries.complete: The refugees are safe. Good work, return to base.
entries.attack_warn_3: Look out! Imperial TIE fighters on the offensive!
entries.attack_warn_2: Head's up, buddy! TIE fighters inbound!
entries.attack_warn_1: Imperial fighters on an attack vector! Watch out!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Hostiles on approach vector to escort target! >
entries.arrived_at_loc: Alliance HQ: Wait here for Alliance Refugee Transport to arrive.
entries.abort: NO! We're not going to make it! Please help us! Don't leave us...
